snippet: Denis R. McDonough, the White House chief of staff, has emerged as a high-energy, efficient and politically skillful manager who is building bridges.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: Denis R. McDonough, the White House chief of staff, has emerged as a high-energy, efficient and politically skillful manager who is building bridges.

headline.main: Capitol Hill Warms to White House Aide
headline.print_headline: Capitol Hill Warms to White House Aide
